OS Lecture 02

##

Reading

#### HOCA

```cpp typedef struct proc_t { proc_link p_link[MAXPROC]; // proc_link: next ptr state_t p_s; // all info that OS needs to save // OS switches one to another // datastructure int qcount; // how many processes on int *semvec[SEMMAX]; } proc_t;

proc_t procTable[MAXPROC];

/* proc_free_h | | proclink stat_t qcount semvec TDL | ——————————————— -> | | | | | | | ——————————————— ->| | | | | | | ——————————————— ->| | | | | | | ——————————————— ->| | | | | | | ——————————————— ->| | | | | | | ——————————————— -> 0

MAXPROC = 5 evert module has an init routine */ ```

  • queues are linked lists with a tail pointer

```cpp /* ———- -> | |<- | ———- | ->| | | | ———– | ->| | | | ———– | ->| | | | ———– | ->| |– tail pointer ———–

*/

```

```cpp initProc(); insertProc(proc_link tp, proc_t *p) // 헤드 = old_tail->next // old_tail->next = 새노드 // 새노드->next = 헤드 // tp는 더블 포인터 // p는 포인터 proc_t removeProc(proc_link tp); // 헤드 리턴 // tail->next = head->next // 없을땐 널 리턴, 하나일땐 tp가 널이됨 proc_t outProc(proc_link *tp, proc_t *p)

proc_t* allocProc() freeProc(proc_t p) proc_t headQueue(proc_link tp)

// freelist는 스택

typedef struct proc_link { int index; struct proc_t *next; } proc_link;

/*

| | | | | proc_link ———————– | | state_t ———————– | | qcount ———————– | | semvec ———————–

*/

```
